name: Buzzfly
description:
Super difficult arena shooter I made to test out an idea. I was playing Rougelight and asking myself how I was essentially going through the same level over and over again but not getting bored. My answer, the upgrades.

Therefore, in Buzzfly, you will be upgrading your ship and then going back to blast away very annoying enemies. Due to the level of difficulty, it might be ten minutes before you get your first upgrade.

WASD to move

Left click to shoot/buy upgrades

Mouse scroll to select different bomb type

Right to fire selected bomb

F4 to toggle fullscreen.
